headline: Essential Properties (EPRT) Q1 FFO Miss Estimates
summary: Essential Properties (EPRT) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of -2.17% and 2.17%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?
